DOC.brief_summary: This is an Extension study of the MICONOS main randomised placebo-controlled trial (NCT00905268), and open to those patients completing the main study. The scientific aim of this extension study is to monitor safety and tolerability of idebenone over two years in patients with Friedreich's Ataxia.
DOC.brief_title: Long-Term Safety and Tolerability of Idebenone in Friedreich's Ataxia Patients (MICONOS Extension)
